title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 §§ 23-3.1 - Special approval required
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 §§ 23-3.1 - Special approval required

State Regulations

Any method of demolition of any building or other
structure not named or described in this Subpart shall not be used unless
granted a special approval. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12
§§
23-3.1

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
